thread.title: Lots of positive signs for 49ers, but record is still 1-4
thread.title_full: Lots of positive signs for 49ers, but record is still 1-4 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Lots of positive signs for 49ers, but record is still 1-4
text:
Photo: Seth Wenig, Associated Press New York Giants wide receiver Dwayne Harris (17) avoids San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) during the second quarter of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) New York Giants wide receiver Dwayne Harris (17) avoids San...
They retrieved a measure of respect Sunday night, even in defeat. Colin Kaepernick showed he still can lead a productive offense, Carlos Hyde showed he can run with conviction and the 49ers showed they can at least compete on the road. New York Giants wide receiver Dwayne Harris (17) avoids San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) during the second quarter of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) New York Giants wide receiver Dwayne Harris (17) avoids San...
They retrieved a measure of respect Sunday night, even in defeat. Colin Kaepernick showed he still can lead a productive offense, Carlos Hyde showed he can run with conviction and the 49ers showed they can at least compete on the road.
